scripts.build: npm run build:babel && npm run build:webpack
scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev
scripts.bump:dev: npm install $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.devDependencies | keys) - .skipBump | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}')
scripts.bump:prod: npm install --save-exact $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.dependencies | keys) - .skipBump | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}')
scripts.start: npm run start:note && npm run start:babel && npm run start:webpack
scripts.start:note: echo "isomorphic-react-dom is not under active development; running in non-watch mode."
